items.raw_string: Until 27 February 2017, non-executive director for Response Eco Ltd, 18 Hyde Gardens, Eastbourne, East Sussex BN21 4PT; water treatment company. I was paid £12,000 a year for this role. Hours: 96 hrs per year. (Registered 10 September 2012; updated 20 March 2017)
